channel.title: Pages on Programmer in Progress
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Programmer in Progress

item.title: About Me
item.description: Who am I I’m a curious person with diverse interests and a passion for computer science and math. Right now I’m an undergraduate student at the University of São Paulo. My Resume My github What is this site It’s my personal website where I will blog about programming, host any web related projects and post some interesting resources Some projects I’m part of Data University of São Paulo’s Data Science and Machine Learning Group

item.title: Resources
item.description: Math Resources Great Math Overflow and Stack Exchange Questions What specific algebraic properties are broken at each Cayley-Dickson stage beyond octonions? Awesome Quora Answers A nice introduction to p-adics and their uses Cool application of Elliptical Curves Why Polinomials matter Quick Roadmap to Algebraic Geometry Beautiful Proof of Fermat’s Last Theorem for n = 3 Schrodinger for Mathematicians Quick proof of Cantor’s Diagonal Argument Why some ‘obvious’ things need to be proved
